brithanyaye wesena shri lankikayinge aarakshawa sambandhayen dadi awadhanayak yomukara thibena bawa rajaya awadharanaya karayi.erata wesena shri lankikayange aarakshawa sambandhayen nirantharayen soya balana bawada yam awadanam thaththwayak pana nanginne nam rajyathanthrika washayen madihathwi awashya kriyamarga kadinamin ganna bawada widesha katayuthu amathyansha sanniwedana anshaye adhyaksha janaral saha athireka lekam rodni perera mahatha ‘dinamina’ ta pawasiya.brithanyaye jiwathwana shri lankikayanta koti hithawadingen wiwidha tharajana pawathina athara ee sambandhayen wishesha awadhanayak yomu kota shri lankikayange aarakshawa thahawuru karana lesa brithanya widesha katayuthu amathyanshayata, erata polisiya athulu baladharin wetha me wanawitath danumdi thibena bawada ee mahatha sandahan kaleya.melesa kisiyam gataluwak pawathinne nam, aarakshawata tharjanayak athnam wahama shri lanka maha komasaris karyalayata danum dena lesa brithanyaye wesena siyalu shri lankikayangen illimak karana rodni perera mahatha ewani danumdimak karanne nam kisindu pakilimakin thorawa awashya kriyamarga ganna bawada awadharanaya kaleya.brithanyaye wesena shri lankikayange awashyatha wenuwen peni sitimata erata shri lanka maha komasaris waidya kris nonis mahatha pramukha karya mandalaya niranthara sudanamin sitina bawada shri lanka widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya sadahan karayi.me athara shri lanka krikat kandayama sahabhagi wu champiyans kusalana krikat tharagawaliye awasan tharanga deka atharathura el.ti.ti.ee. hithawadin pirisak wisin sidukala badha kirima sambandhayen soya bala warthawak labadena lesa brithanyaye shri lanka mahakomasaris karyalaya wetha danum di thibena bawada adhyaksha janaralwaraya kiweya..
